Two leading Hindi dailies reported the i: 2. Dainik Jagran published a report titled "दौलतपुर में योगी की तारीफ करने पर संन्यासी को किया मरणासन्न (A monk in Daulatpur on death’s door for praising Yogi -translated)" with a photograph of the badly bruised monk.
The monk: Manoj Baba, was addressing a group of people outside the Hanuman temple and praised the Chief Minister for the arrangements in the Kumbh Mela.
